info.title: Network Detection and Response (NDR)
info.description: Advanced Cybersecurity Analytics Service (ACAS) for AI-based analysis with explainable intelligence of network events captured by the Montimage Monitoring Tools (MMT)

externalDocs.description: Find out more about Montimage open-source projects

tags.name: mmt
tags.description: Everything relates to manipulating the MMT Tool

tags.name: reports
tags.description: Access to reports which are the output of analysing a pcap file

externalDocs.description: More detail on the report format

tags.name: dpi
tags.description: Deep Packet Inspection for protocol analysis

tags.name: logs
tags.description: Access to the log of MMT Tools

tags.name: security
tags.description: API relates to security operations including rule-based detection, IP blocking, and NATS messaging

tags.name: models
tags.description: API relates to the model and the building model process

tags.name: features
tags.description: API for feature extraction from PCAP files

tags.name: predictions
tags.description: API relates to the prediction process

post.summary: Offline prediction with automatic MMT analysis
post.description: Start offline prediction on a PCAP file. Server automatically handles MMT analysis.

modelId.description: ID of the trained model to use for prediction

pcapFile.description: Name of the uploaded PCAP file. Server handles MMT analysis automatically.

useQueue.description: Use job queue for non-blocking execution (default: true)

jobId.description: Job ID for polling status (when useQueue=true)

400.description: Missing required parameters or MMT analysis failed

500.description: Internal server error or MMT timeout

get.description: Get the status of a queued prediction job

post.summary: Start integrated online prediction with MMT-probe
post.description: Start real-time AI-based intrusion detection on a network interface. This endpoint combines MMT-probe packet capture, DPI analysis, feature extraction, and AI prediction in one integrated pipeline.

modelId.description: Model ID to use for prediction

interface.description: Network interface to monitor (e.g., eth0, lo)

get.description: Get the current status of online prediction

post.description: Stop the running online prediction and MMT-probe

get.summary: Accuracy metric is the proportion of the total number of correct predictions that were correct
get.description: Get the accuracy metric

get.summary: Impact metric of data poisoing attacks (or accuracy decrease) measures the decrease of a performance score between benign model and poisoned model
